metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19665 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The Bluetooth subsystem in QEMU mishandles negative values for length variables, leading to memory corruption.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-06-18, proposed fix not committed as of https://github.com/qemu/qemu/commit/c0188e69d, the bluetooth subsystem is marked as unmaintained  We will not be fixing this issue in Ubuntu stable releases. We recommend not using the bluetooth support.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
